Package com.openclassrooms.tourguide.controller

Class TourGuideController

java.lang.Object
com.openclassrooms.tourguide.controller.TourGuideController
@RestController public class TourGuideController extends Object
A class that receives requests made from some specific URL which parameter is always the user's name. Since @RestController is used, this means the response returned is serialized. The response will be in JSON.
Version:
1.1
Author:
[NPC]TourGuide BackEnd Team, Cappon SÃ©bastien

  • Constructor Details

    • TourGuideController

      public TourGuideController()

  • Method Details

    • getHomePage

      @GetMapping("/") public String getHomePage()
      A GetMapping method on the / URI with an user name as RequestParam. It just returns a welcoming message.
      Returns:
      A String.

    • getUser

      @GetMapping("/user") public User getUser(@RequestParam String userName)
      A GetMapping method on the /user URI with an user name as RequestParam. It calls the iTourGuideService methods getUser(User user) and returns the User whose name is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A User.
      Singularity :
      This method was added for testing purpose.

    • getUserLocation

      @GetMapping("/getLocation") public gpsUtil.location.VisitedLocation getUserLocation(@RequestParam String userName)
      A GetMapping method on the /getLocation URI with an user name as RequestParam. It calls the iTourGuideService methods getUserLocation(User user) and returns the VistedLocation for the user whose name is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A VistedLocation.
      Singularity :
      VisitedLocation come from GpsUtil external module.

    • getNearbyAttractionList

      @GetMapping("/getNearbyAttractions") public List<AttractionNearUserDto> getNearbyAttractionList(@RequestParam String userName)
      A GetMapping method on the /getNearbyAttractions URI with an user name as RequestParam. Get the closest five tourist attractions to the user no matter how far away they are. It returns a new JSON object that contains the name and the lat/long of the tourist attraction, the user's location lat/long, the distance in miles between the user's location and each of the attractions. and the reward points for visiting each Attraction.
      Returns:
      A list of AttractionNearUserDto.

    • getUserRewardList

      @GetMapping("/getRewards") public List<Reward> getUserRewardList(@RequestParam String userName)
      A GetMapping method on the /getRewards URI with an user name as RequestParam. It calls the iTourGuideService methods getUserRewardList(User user) and returns a list of Reward for the user whose name is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Reward list.

    • getTripDealList

      @GetMapping("/getTripDeals") public List<tripPricer.Provider> getTripDealList(@RequestParam String userName)
      A GetMapping method on the /getTripDeals URI with an user name as RequestParam. It calls the iTourGuideService methods getTripDealList(User user) and returns a list of Provider for the user whose name is the one passed in parameter.
      Returns:
      A Provider list.
      Singularity :
      Provider come from TripPricer external module.
